content: On the left, you'll see a **Purple Lingzhi** and a path to take, but there's also one straight up ahead at the edge of the cliff.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Woods_of_Ember_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Woods of Ember Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Height of Ember' and the sub-subsection 'Yoaguai Chief - Father of Stones'.
The content is as follows:
On the left, you'll see a **Purple Lingzhi** and a path to take, but there's also one straight up ahead at the edge of the cliff.
